alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 11:31PM CDT until May 06 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ELLIS AND SOUTHWESTERN DALLAS COUNTIES... At 1130 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Palmer, or 7 miles east of Waxahachie, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Grand Prairie, Desoto, Cedar Hill, Duncanville, Lancaster, Waxahachie, Ennis, Midlothian, Glenn Heights, Red Oak, Hutchins, Wilmer, Ovilla, Ferris, Palmer, Oak Leaf, Maypearl, Pecan Hill and Rockett. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
